title: Platform support information for the Netdata agent.

platform_map.description: Maps CPU architectures to Docker platform strings. Used by CI when generating build matrices.

arch_order.description: Defines the CPU architecture sort order used when generating build matrices in CI.

include.description: Defines data for platforms that are included in CI.

support_type.description: Defines the support tier that the platform is in.

notes.description: Any additional notes about the platform.

eol_check.description: Indicates if EOL checks should be done for this platform. Only relevant if the platform is included in CI. If the value is a string, that value is used for the EOL check lookup, otherwise the value of the distro key is used.

base_image.description: A string specifying the Docker image to be used for testing this platform.

env_prep.description: A string containing any shell commands that need to be run to prep the platform for testing in CI.

jsonc_removal.description: A string containing a shell command to uninstall JSON-C development files during CI checks.

test.description: Contains additional data for usage by CI.

ebpf-core.description: If true, then eBPF CO-RE CI jobs should be run for this platform.

packages.description: Additional information about native packages for this platform.

type.description: Indicates the type of native packages to build for the platform.

arches.description: A list of CPU architectures (specified in the usual manner for the platform) that native packages are built for for this platform.

repo_distro.description: Identifies the repository name to be used when publishing packages for this platform.

alt_links.description: A list of alternative repository names to be used when publishing packages for this platform.
